additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Heating system: central, gas, Hot water: gas 
 Beautiful flat in Vera
Space: 82  m2
Price: 850 $
Minimum rental period is one year!
Location:
Just renovated bright and cozy apartment on Melikishvili avenue,in the Vera district.The building was built in the early 1950s during the Stalin's period. It’s located face to face to the old Philharmonic House – Tbilisi State Concert Hall and Vera Park. 
Flat: 
High-ceiling 2,5 rooms flat on 4. floor, has entrance hall, bright living room, sleeping room, one balcony, bath with a shower and toilet, second toilet for  guests, kitchen. The apartment is fully furnished and equipped, has central heating, wood parquet. Because of the brand new triple-glazed windows, the flat is very quiet and cozy.
Apartment has 12.69 m2 Cellar.
Detailed information:
Fully furnished 
WiFi
Washing machine
Dishwasher
TV
A/C in every room
Triple glazed windows
Fully renovated in 2014
Facts:

Cellar: 12.69 m2
